snippet.title: Comiccon Montréal Trailer | Turbo Kid
snippet.description:
Wishlist Turbo Kid on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1733250?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=comiccon2022

The newest trailer for Turbo Kid, the upcoming Metroidvania by developer Outerminds, based on the 2015 film. Watch our devs flex their bike tricks in this short clip showcasing various sewers and wastelands. The best part? You'll get to play it in a post-apocalyptic future near you!

https://turbokidgame.com

Follow us on social:
Discord ------- https://discord.gg/Th8cZ7ycaX
Facebook ---- https://facebook.com/TurboKidGame
Instagram --- https://www.instagram.com/turbokidgame/
Twitter -------- https://twitter.com/TurboKidGame

Music By Le Matos: https://www.youtube.com/c/LeMatosBand

Sound Design by Vibe Avenue: https://vibeavenue.com/en/

In collaboration with
EMA Films: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChHZzuVOv7qScY7LyTJfTqQ
